name: s3lab
description: **1. MNIST Trainer** ---- Allows user to upload the [MNIST dataset](https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B-HwpreJA3WzbnZodkJZVWNfUTg) and get a trained model based on the parameters specified. Description about the dataset can be found [here](http://yann.lecun.com/exdb/mnist/).
